jayree:packagexml.description: generate a complete package xml form the specified org

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

quickfilter.name: quickfilter
quickfilter.description: csv separated list of metadata type, member or file names to filter on

matchwholeword.name: matchwholeword
matchwholeword.description: enable 'match whole word' for the quickfilter

jayree:automation:usersyncstatus.description: check the Lightning Sync User Sync Status and reset sync if needed
examples:
$ sfdx jayree:automation:usersyncstatus -o 'Name'
    configSetup: User assigned to active Lightning Sync configuration... Yes
    userContacts/userEvents: Salesforce and Exchange email addresses linked... Linked/Linked
    userContacts/userEvents: Salesforce to Exchange sync status... Initial sync completed/Initial sync completed
    userContacts/userEvents: Exchange to Salesforce sync status... Initial sync completed/Initial sync completed

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

jayree:packagedescription:create.description: creates an empty package with the description

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

jayree:packagedescription:get.description: get the description within a package
examples:
$ sfdx jayree:packagedescription:get --file FILENAME
    Description of Package FILENAME

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

jayree:packagedescription:remove.description: remove the description within a package

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

jayree:packagedescription:set.description: set the description within a package

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation
